languages.text: Простор Коронус стал охотничьим угодьем для ново{mf|го|й} нечестиво{mf|го|й} влады{mf|ки|чицы} из династии фон Валанциус. На руинах старого порядка возводилось новое царство, славящее Темных богов варпа. В секторе Каликсис началось приготовление грандиозной карательной эскадры. Но пропустят ли ее бурные варп-шторма Великого Разлома, не ведал никто.

The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.
languages.original_text: Простор Коронус стал охотничьим угодьем для ново{mf|го|й} нечестиво{mf|го|й} влады{mf|ки|чицы} из династии фон Валанциус. На руинах старого порядка возводилось новое царство, славящее Темных богов варпа. В секторе Каликсис началось приготовление грандиозной карательной эскадры. Но пропустят ли ее бурные варп-шторма Великого Разлома, не ведал никто.

traits.locale_text: The Koronus Expanse became the hunting ground for a new unholy sovereign from the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born, worshipping the Dark Gods of the warp. A grand construction started in the Calixis Sector of a new gargantuan vindictive squadron. Though, no one knew if the furious Warp Storms of the Great Rift will let it through.

The Koronus Expanse became the hunting ground for a new unholy sovereign from the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born, worshipping the Dark Gods of the warp. A grand construction started in the Calixis Sector of a new gargantuan vindictive squadron. Though, no one knew if the furious Warp Storms of the Great Rift will let it through.

The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区成为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝新任邪恶君主的狩猎场。在旧秩序的废墟之中，一个崇拜亚空间黑暗诸神的新王国诞生了。帝国派来了规模庞大的惩戒舰队，舰队集结在了卡利西斯星区。然而，没有人知道它能否穿越大裂隙，在猛烈的亚空间风暴中存活下来。
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区成为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝新任邪恶君主的狩猎场。在旧秩序的废墟之中，一个崇拜亚空间黑暗诸神的新王国诞生了。帝国派来了规模庞大的惩戒舰队，舰队集结在了卡利西斯星区。然而，没有人知道它能否穿越大裂隙，在猛烈的亚空间风暴中存活下来。

languages.text: Die Koronus-Ausdehnung wurde zum Jagdrevier des neuen bösen Kopfs der Dynastie von Valancius. Aus den Ruinen der alten Ordnung wurde ein neues Königreich geboren. Ein Königreich, das die Dunklen Götter des Warps verehrte. Die Gründung eines neuen, gigantischen Strafgeschwaders begann im Calixis-Sektor. Aber niemand wusste, ob die Einheit es durch die fürchterlichen Warpstürme im Großen Riss schaffen würde.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

traits.locale_text: Die Ausdehnung wurde zum Jagdrevier des neuen bösen Kopfs der Dynastie von Valancius. Aus den Ruinen der alten Ordnung wurde ein neues Königreich geboren, das die Dunklen Götter des Warps verehrte. Die Gründung eines neuen, gigantischen Strafgeschwaders begann im Calixis-Sektor. Aber niemand wusste, ob die Einheit es durch die fürchterlichen Warpstürme im Großen Riss schaffen würde.

languages.text: Les Étendues de Koronus devinrent le terrain de chasse {mf|du souverain malfaisant|de la souveraine malfaisante} de la dynastie von Valancius, qui bâtit un nouveau royaume au service des Dieux Sombres du Warp... sur les ruines de l'ancien ordre. La formation d'un escadron punitif colossal commença dans le secteur Calixis, mais personne ne savait s'il parviendrait à traverser les tempêtes Warp déchaînées de la Grande Faille.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

traits.locale_text: Les Étendues devinrent le terrain de chasse {mf|du souverain malfaisant|de la souveraine malfaisante} de la dynastie von Valancius, qui bâtit un nouveau royaume au service des Dieux Sombres du Warp sur les ruines de l'ancien ordre. La formation d'un escadron punitif colossal commença dans le secteur Calixis, mais personne ne savait s'il parviendrait à traverser les tempêtes Warp déchaînées de la Grande Faille.

languages.text: La Extensión de Koronus se convirtió en el coto de caza de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} y pervers{mf|o|a} soberan{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius. De las ruinas del viejo orden nació un nuevo reino que adoraba a los Dioses Oscuros de la disformidad. Empezó a organizarse un nuevo escuadrón disciplinario colosal en el sector Calixis, aunque nadie sabía si sobreviviría a las devastadoras tormentas de disformidad de la Gran Fisura.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

traits.locale_text: La Extensión se convirtió en el coto de caza de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} y pervers{mf|o|a} soberan{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius. De las ruinas del viejo orden nació un nuevo reino que adoraba a los Dioses Oscuros de la disformidad. Empezó a organizarse un nuevo escuadrón disciplinario colosal en el sector Calixis, aunque nadie sabía si sobreviviría a las devastadoras tormentas de disformidad de la Gran Fisura.

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンスはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の新しい邪悪な君主の狩猟場となった。古い秩序の廃墟から、歪みの暗黒神を崇拝する新しい王国が誕生した。カリクシス星域では、新たに大規模な懲罰艦隊の編成が始まった。しかし、大亀裂の猛烈な歪みの嵐を乗り越えられるかどうかは誰にもわからなかった。
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンスはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の新しい邪悪な君主の狩猟場となった。古い秩序の廃墟から、歪みの暗黒神を崇拝する新しい王国が誕生した。カリクシス星域では、新たに大規模な懲罰艦隊の編成が始まった。しかし、大亀裂の猛烈な歪みの嵐を乗り越えられるかどうかは誰にもわからなかった。

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği, von Valancius hanedanlığının yeni, habis hükümdarının av sahasına dönüştü. Eski düzenin küllerinden, öteboyutun Kara Tanrılarına tapılan, yeni bir krallık doğdu. Calixis Sektörü'nde yeni, devasa bir cezai eskadra oluşturulsa da hiç kimse filonun Büyük Yarık'ın hiddetli öteboyut fırtınalarından geçip geçemeyeceğini bilmiyordu.
languages.original_text: The Koronus Expanse became the hunting grounds of the new wicked sovereign of the von Valancius dynasty. From the ruins of the old order, a new kingdom was born — one that worshipped the Dark Gods of the warp. The formation of a new gargantuan punitive squadron began in the Calixis Sector. However, no one knew if it would make it through the furious warp storms of the Great Rift.

traits.locale_text: Koronus Enginliği, von Valancius hanedanlığının yeni, habis hükümdarının av sahası hâline geldi. Eski düzenin küllerinden yeni bir krallık doğdu: Öteboyutun Karanlık Tanrılarına tapılan bir krallık. Calixis Sektörü'nde yeni, devasa bir cezai eskadra oluşturuldu ancak kimse filonun Büyük Yarık'ın hiddetli öteboyut fırtınalarından geçip geçemeyeceğini bilmiyordu.
